title: Love in a Snow Storm
description: Never fall in love with your best friend's little sister...Contractor and army reservist Jake Foster fell in love with Dani Minelli when she was a colt-legged high school senior. He knew he was too old to even look at her, let alone touch.Dani’s been trying to get his attention since returning to Pine Harbour a grown woman—and failing miserably at every turn.This winter, everything is going to change. And when the snow stops falling, Jake and Dani won't be able to hide from their attraction any longer.This is a full-length novel (60,000 words, 220 pages)
author: Zoe York
